fun_moment.text: When Tink pulled off an amazing prank by painting Dosh’s Palace with berry juice!

about.fun_fact: He gets so nervous around Posh that all he can say is "wibble"
about.text: Bumbling and scatter-brained, he's guaranteed to destroy anything fragile! If he can go 10 minutes without tripping, it probably means he was asleep. Always up for an adventure, Clott is the only one who will go along with Tink’s harebrained schemes.
